data.eml:eml: The identity of the Sarawak freshwater crab Parathelphusa oxygona Nobili, 1901, with description of a new species, Parathelphusa nobilii, from Western Kalimantan, Indonesia, Borneo (Crustacea: Brachyura: Gecarcinucidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ng, Peter K. L. (2014): The identity of the Sarawak freshwater crab Parathelphusa oxygona Nobili, 1901, with description of a new species, Parathelphusa nobilii, from Western Kalimantan, Indonesia, Borneo (Crustacea: Brachyura: Gecarcinucidae). Zootaxa 3774 (1): 31-44, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3774.1.2
